text: niccayamāka ḥpir'avṉ ippūmiyil perumaiyaṭittuk koṇṭu, anta pūmiyiluḷḷavarkaḷaip (pala) piriviṉarkaḷākki, avarkaḷiliruntu oru kūṭṭattārai palahīṉappaṭuttiṉāṉ; avarkaḷuṭaiya āṇ kuḻantaikaḷai aṟut(tuk kolai cey)tu peṇ kuḻantaikaḷai uyiruṭaṉ viṭṭum vaittāṉ; niccayamāka avaṉ kuḻappam ceyvōril oruvaṉāka iruntāṉ
